/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -std=c++98  -shared -Wl,-soname,libOpenMMPlumedOpenCL.so -o libOpenMMPlumedOpenCL.so CMakeFiles/OpenMMPlumedOpenCL.dir/src/OpenCLPlumedKernelFactory.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenMMPlumedOpenCL.dir/src/OpenCLPlumedKernels.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenMMPlumedOpenCL.dir/src/OpenCLPlumedKernelSources.cpp.o  -L/home/mjharvey/miniconda3/lib  -L/home/mjharvey/miniconda3/lib/plugins /opt/cuda/8.0/lib64/libOpenCL.so -lOpenMM -lOpenMMOpenCL ../../libOpenMMPlumed.so -lOpenMM -lplumed2 -Wl,-rpath,/home/mjharvey/miniconda3/lib:/home/mjharvey/miniconda3/lib/plugins:/opt/cuda/8.0/lib64:/home/mjharvey/working/acellera/openmm-plumed/build:
